summary: The diff does not show the uploaded intro audio file being added as a frontend static asset, and the truncated Hero.tsx excerpt does not provide verifiable evidence of an actual HTML audio player wired to that asset in the required location. Two documentation/state files were also updated, which were not requested by the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Store the uploaded audio file as a frontend static asset and wire the Hero audio player to that exact file (use the original uploaded filename; no placeholders).
missing_requirements.reason: No new static asset file was added ("Added: 0"), and no evidence is shown of referencing an uploaded audio filename under /assets/ in code. Without an added audio file, the requirement to use the uploaded original audio asset cannot be met.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add an intro audio player in the Hero section positioned directly under the portrait and directly above the “Simply Shane Designs (c)sm” / “-- PRESENTS --” headings, with standard controls (at minimum play/pause and seek).
missing_requirements.reason: The Hero.tsx content is truncated before the portrait/headings area where the player would be inserted, and the excerpt provided contains no visible <audio> element or player implementation. Therefore, the required placement and presence of standard audio controls cannot be confirmed from the provided diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Project documentation/state updates unrelated to adding an intro audio player (e.g., updating generated frontend file summaries and overall project state summary).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to embed an intro audio player and add the uploaded audio static asset. Changes to documentation/state files are not requested deliverables.
